input_text.Prompt:
Given a item title and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item title:
Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet (Pearl White/Red Floral)

Item features:
Snap-fit visor
In-Mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner
Acu Dial fit system
20 vents
input_text.Response A: Looking for a way to give your cat a comfortable and stylish place to call their own? Look no further than the Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black! This beautiful cat tree is made from high-quality wood and covered in black carpet, making it the perfect place for your cat to relax and play. With dimensions of 47" H x 23 1/2" L x 15 1/2" W, this cat tree is the perfect size for most cats. And with easy-to-follow instructions and all the necessary tools included, assembly is a breeze! So why wait? Give your cat the perfect place to call home with the Cat Tree 47" Level Condo Furniture Scratching Post Pet House Brown Scratcher Black.
input_text.Response B: The Giro Women's Skyla Cycling Helmet is designed to provide the best in comfort and safety. It features an in-mold polycarbonate shell with EPS liner, which is durable and lightweight. The 20 vents help keep your head cool and dry during long rides, while the snap-fit visor provides excellent sun protection. The Acu Dial fit system allows for a custom fit, and the helmet is available in Pearl White/Red Floral.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
